data.title: Sargans → Memmingen by Train from €49.99
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Sargans to Memmingen in 2h 23m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Sargans to Memmingen today.
data.text:
Want to find out more about taking the train from Sargans to Memmingen? Look no further.

There are around 28 trains per day running between Sargans and Memmingen, which usually take 3 hours 36 minutes to complete the 74 miles (118 km) journey. It can take as little as 2 hours 23 minutes on the fastest services though, if you want to get there as quickly as possible. Although there aren't any direct services on this line, it's still easy to travel to Memmingen from Sargans, you'll just need to make 1 change along the way. During your journey, you're likely to be travelling with DB, ÖBB or SBB, as these are the main train operators on this route.

You can save money on train tickets from Sargans to Memmingen if you book in advance, as tickets usually start from €49.99. Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to compare ticket prices and get the cheapest fares.

Want to book your train tickets now? Just start a search with us today. If you want to find out more about the journey, read on for timetables (including first and last train times), FAQs and tips on how to book cheap train tickets.
